dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SET AV Infringement_NRID11786]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 11:23 AM
To: christophers@nr-online.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SET AV Infringement_NRID11786]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] SET AV Infringement_NRID11786
Date: Sat, 16 Apr 2005 22:46:07 +0100
From: <christophers@nr-online.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <aalmeida@theplanet.com>

Please quote the above SET_NRID11786 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.

We believe that the following website  http://www.thedesimedia.com/ intends
to display and/or offer A/V content for the current India v.
Pakistan cricket series.

SET Satellite (Singapore) Pte Ltd is the official licensor of sound and
moving picture rights in the current India v. Pakistan cricket series
(including still images derived from the moving images) and as such has the
exclusive right to control, manage and exploit these rights.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from SET Satellite
(Singapore) Pte Ltd to use the A/V content your potential present use is an
infringement of SET Satellite (Singapore) Pte Ltd?s rights.  Please
immediately cease all such potential infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

I confirm that SET Satellite (Singapore) Pte Ltd is the official licensor of
the rights to the A/V content referenced above and that NetResult is
authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance. On behalf of SET Satellite (Singapore) Pte Ltd I hereby state
that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V content in the manner
complained of is not authorised by SET Satellite (Singapore) Pte Ltd and/or,
their agents, or the law.

I, Christopher Stokes, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to
constitute an express or implied waiver of any of SET Satellite
(Singapore) Pte Ltd?s rights or remedies, all of which are expressly
reserved.

We thank you for your cooperation.


Yours sincerely,
Christopher Stokes
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA

Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1731
Fax: +44 (0)7092 804032
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, Harley House, 2 St John Street,
Hereford, HR1 2NB

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.


- --------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
- --------------------------------------------------------------------



- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----

Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

=GV92
